attributes.action: SAVE LOUGHTON'S (ESSEX)  OPEN SPACES FROM DEVELOPERS
attributes.additional_details: EFDC have not given the residence enough time to voice their concerns. They are giving limited amount of questionnaires and a deadline to let them know what we think of these proposals by 12 December 2016.
attributes.background: Epping Forest District Council have proposed putting housing on 12 of our open spaces this also includes our local library and station car parks. Residents have enjoyed informal recreation on many of these open spaces for at least 20 years.

rejection.details:
The issue you raise is the responsibility of Epping Forest District Council, not of the UK Government or Parliament. You could start a new petition about this issue with Epping Forest District Council using the link below:

http://rds.eppingforestdc.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx
